original_text: Each pair was one male and one female. This happened in the way that God had told Noah. When they were all in the ship, the Lord shut the door.
korean_text: 들어간 것들은 모든 것의 암수라 하나님이 그에게 명하신 대로 들어가매 여호와께서 그를 들여보내고 문을 닫으시니라

sentences.original_text: Each pair was one male and one female
sentences.korean_translation: 각 쌍은 수컷 한 마리와 암컷 한 마리였습니다

sentences.original_text: This happened in the way that God had told Noah
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 하나님이 노아에게 말씀하신 대로 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: When they were all in the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 모두 배 안에 있었을 때
